mapper.insert: INSERT INTO INNO72_PAYMENT_PAY_INFO (ID, SP_ID, TYPE, TERMINAL_TYPE, STATUS, OUT_TRADE_NO, PREPAY_ID, SUBJECT, TRADE_NO, SELLER_ID,BUYER_ID,IS_REFUND,REFUND_AMOUNT,NOTIFY_STATUS,NOTIFY_PARAM, TOTAL_FEE,PRICE,QUANTITY,NOTIFY_URL,RETURN_URL,SHOW_URL,NOTIFY_ID,NOTIFY_TIME, CREATE_TIME,UPDATE_TIME) VALUES(#{id},#{spId},#{type},#{terminalType},#{status},#{outTradeNo},#{prepayId}, #{subject},#{tradeNo},#{sellerId},#{buyerId},#{isRefund},#{refundAmount},#{notifyStatus},#{notifyParam}, #{totalFee},#{price},#{quantity}, #{notifyUrl},#{returnUrl},#{showUrl},#{notifyId},#{notifyTime}, #{createTime},#{updateTime})
